name: Constellation
headline: Proof of concept for auto-scaling applications via AWS EKS, driven by CI
description: This project uses AWS and Kubernetes via AWS EKS to demonstrate autoscaling, using infrastructure managed by Terraform and automated via Jenkins CI.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: aws, eks, aws eks, kubernetes, scalable containerization, orchestration, elastic kubernetes, amazon web services, elastic container service for kubernetes
